labels.text: In this installation, Ni Youyu used 300 coins to create a star chart inspired by ancient Chinese cosmology. The artist hammered each coin to remove its original text and image, then adorned the flattened surface with miniature landscapes, animals, people, or body parts. Through this labour-intensive process, Ni eliminated the original monetary value of each coin. This oblique commentary on the global economy, consumerism, and the commodification of art connects humanity with nature while also offering a contemporary approach to traditional shan shui (landscape) painting.

Throughout his diverse body of work in painting, printmaking, sculpture, installation, and video, Ni Youyu draws inspiration from the aesthetics and philosophy of traditional Chinese ink painting. The installation, Galaxy, consists of a constellation of ‘stars’ made up of flattened coins affixed on the walls of a room. Meticulously painted by the artist, each coin carries miniature landscapes, human anatomy, animals, and other subjects. The installation simulates the sensory experience of floating through suspended space and time and allows the viewer to savor sights and scenes that capture the moments of human existence. A video of Ni creating the work accompanies the installation.
在這組裝置中，倪有魚以300枚硬幣創造出一幅星圖，啟發自中國古代宇宙學。藝術家將硬幣逐一鎚平，移除硬幣本身的文字和圖案，然後在磨平的表面繪上微型山水畫、動物、人物和身體部份，過程鉅細無遺，並消除了硬幣原本的貨幣價值。作品間接評論現今環球經濟、消費主義和藝術商品化現象，在聯繫人和大自然的同時，也為傳統山水畫作出當代詮釋。
倪有魚從傳統中國水墨畫的美學和哲學中汲取靈感，創作豐富多樣，包括繪畫、版畫、雕塑、裝置和錄像的作品。《銀河》這件裝置，乍看如漫天繁星，實為貼滿磨平硬幣的空間。硬幣上的山水、人體、和動物微型畫精巧別緻。置身此間，彷彿飄浮於靜止的時空之中，細味世間轉瞬即逝的景致。裝置並附有倪有魚製作作品的紀錄影片。

images.AltText: Installation consisting of flattened coins, painted in acrylic with miniature landscapes, animals, people, and body parts. They are arranged and illuminated on the walls in a dark room to resemble a star chart.
images.AltTextTC: 裝置由多枚鎚平了的硬幣組成，表面以塑膠彩繪畫微型山水、動物、人物和身體不同部位。硬幣展示於一個黑暗的房間內，它們在牆上排列，投上燈光，恍如一幅星象圖。

images.AltText: Multiple small round ink paintings on flattened coins are clustered together on a black surface. Each painting depicts a different singular, delicately painted image, ranging from people, landscapes, and animals.
images.AltTextTC: 多幅圓形的小型水墨，繪於經壓平的金屬硬幣上，置於黑色背景。每幅各有一個不同圖像，細緻描繪而成，包括人物、山水及動物等。
